PathFinderEdge module¶

PFE / VNE remote control, upgrade, and register

class qe_modules.PathFinderEdge.PathFinderEdge(PFE_Hudson='build2:8080', PFE_Branch='VNEX_8.0', PFE_Type='qumu-videonet-edge-centos', PFE_Installation_Name='qumu-videonet-edge-centos.noarch')[source]¶

Bases: object

Helper class to deal with PFE upgrades.

get_latest_successful_build()[source]¶

Identify latest successful build on Jekins.

register_PFE(QED_Name, PFE_IP, regToken, PFE_user, PFE_password)[source]¶

Register PFE device with PathFInder.

  • QED_Name - DNS / IP of the PathFidner Server.
  • PFE_IP - address of the PathFinderEndge to register.
  • regToken - token received from PathFinder for registering the PFE.
  • PFE_User & PFE_password - user credentials to the PFE.
Parameters:
  • QED_Name (str.) – DNS / IP of the PathFidner Server.
  • PFE_IP (str.) – address of the PathFinderEndge to register.
  • regToken (str.) – token received from PathFinder for registering the PFE.
  • PFE_User (str.) – user credentials to the PFE.
  • PFE_password (str.) – user credentials to the PFE.
Returns:

bool – registration response status (.ok).
Raises:

UpgradeError
upgrade_PFE(PFE_IP)[source]¶

Upgrade PFE to latest successful version.
